item.title: CVE-2024-22150|2024-01-31T18:18:30.984Z -- PWR Plugins -- Portfolio & Image Gallery for WordPress | PowerFolio
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PWR Plugins Portfolio & Image Gallery for WordPress | PowerFolio allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Portfolio & Image Gallery for WordPress | PowerFolio: from n/a through 3.1.
